body_html:
@soumith and @SsnL: Thank you for your quick responses.

Can I create an issue to create the batched version of torch.qr() based on MAGMA? It seems that they support batch QR decomposition:
http://icl.cs.utk.edu/projectsfiles/magma/doxygen/group__group__orthogonal__batched.html

Given batch QR, I can compute batch torch.symeig() using the famous QR algorithm.
body_text:
@soumith and @SsnL: Thank you for your quick responses.
Can I create an issue to create the batched version of torch.qr() based on MAGMA? It seems that they support batch QR decomposition:
http://icl.cs.utk.edu/projectsfiles/magma/doxygen/group__group__orthogonal__batched.html
Given batch QR, I can compute batch torch.symeig() using the famous QR algorithm.
body:
@soumith and @SsnL: Thank you for your quick responses. 

Can I create an issue to create the batched version of `torch.qr()` based on MAGMA? It seems that they support batch QR decomposition:
http://icl.cs.utk.edu/projectsfiles/magma/doxygen/group__group__orthogonal__batched.html

Given batch QR, I can compute batch `torch.symeig()` using [the famous QR algorithm](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QR_algorithm).
